title: Subpart 380-3 - Notice To Employer of Foreseeable Qualifying Event
content:
Subpart 380-3 - Notice To Employer of Foreseeable Qualifying Event

State Regulations
§ 380-3.1 - Employee notice requirements for paid family leave
§ 380-3.2 - Content of notice to employer
§ 380-3.3 - Compliance with employer policy
§ 380-3.4 - Advance notice to carrier by employees not required; advance notice to carrier by individual business owner
§ 380-3.5 - Failure to give 30 days advance notice for foreseeable leave

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
